Hi, I’m Przemek I’m an IT architect specializing in Microsoft 365, PowerShell automation, and Power Platform solutions.
By day, I manage email infrastructure and automation systems for a large enterprise. By night (and weekends), I document the interesting problems I encounter.
Why This Blog? Every complex IT project has a story - the things that went wrong, the unexpected behaviors, the workarounds that became permanent solutions.
Microsoft documentation is great for the happy path. This blog is for everything else.
What I Write About PowerShell automation at enterprise scale Power Apps & Power Automate patterns and gotchas Exchange Online administration and troubleshooting Email security (DMARC, DKIM, SPF implementations) Azure integrations and automation Contact Find me on:
LinkedIn GitHub Questions about a post? See that “Suggest Changes” link at the bottom? That goes to GitHub - open an issue or PR.
“I learn from the mistakes of those who follow my advice.”
